message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially even more than $1500000. While I can't disclose specific details just yet, I'm confident it aligns with your interests. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1750000. This represents a substantial return on investment, and I'm sure you'll find it a worthwhile addition to your portfolio. Let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.
